snippet: The United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, also called on both Israelis and Palestinians to offer goodwill gestures during a visit aimed at revitalizing the peace process.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon, during a visit aimed at revitalizing the largely moribund peace process, urges Israel to refrain from further settlement construction and to offer good-will gestures to the Palestinians.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations secretary general, Ban Ki-moon, also called on both Israelis and Palestinians to offer goodwill gestures during a visit aimed at revitalizing the peace process.

headline.seo: Ban Ki-moon Urges Israelis and Palestinians to Resume Talks
headline.main: U.N. Leader Urges Israelis and Palestinians to Resume Talks
headline.print_headline: U.N. Chief Urges Israel to Halt Further Settlement Construction
